name: Isys Group
overview:
ISYS Group Ltd is a leader in the development of workforce and workplace management systems. It also provides all the professional services required to ensure a successful project including: installation, configuration, training and support and maintenance.

ISYS Group products address all areas of time & attendance, access control, staff planning and scheduling, hr record keeping, job costing, employee profiling, absence management and payroll processing.

Major application modules: Intelligent Time, Intelligent HR, Intelligent Job Costing, Intelligent Access Control Intelligent Scheduling. These modules can be run in various formats including â€˜thickâ€™ clients ie Windows and â€˜thinâ€™ clients i.e. terminal services or web clients through your existing browser.

ISYS Group has its headquarters in Swindon, England, with remote offices in Newcastle, Ireland and Wales. Providing solutions and consultancy for all UK based businesses. On request Isys services are available outside the UK for selected projects.

The ISYS Intelligent product suite is a 10yr old established and mature platform, which we continually develop and add bespoke features for customers. This enhancement process benefits new and existing customers and strengths the Isys product range. Our development roadmap continues to identify new products often guided by customers user group meetings.
